{{menutrail|Main menu|New game menu}} [[File:ClassSelection.png|thumb|The class selection menu in [[The Ultimate Torment and Torture|TUTNT]].]]The '''class selection menu''' is displayed when starting a new game if there are more than one class marked as being available by being listed in the {{c|PlayerClasses}} property of a [[GameInfo definition]] or added through [[KEYCONF]]. If a [[player class]] has the {{Flag|NOMENU}} flag set, however, said class will be excluded from being listed in the menu. Its [[MENUDEF]] name is {{c|PlayerclassMenu}}.
It is the first [[new game menu]], being followed by the [[episode selection menu]] and finally the [[skill selection menu]]. [[Category:Menus]]
